sentence.Network_en: After a quietus of twenty years she returned.

sentence.Network_en: The plan has finally got its quietus, ie been abandoned.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: abbreviation of medieval Latin quietus est 'he is quit' (see quit), originally used as a form of receipt or discharge on payment of a debt

means.word_mean: 1. euphemisms for death (based on an analogy between lying in a bed and in a tomb);

sentences.sentence: "she was laid to rest beside her husband"
"they had to put their family pet to sleep"
